name: Death, Debt or Happiness
description:
Title: Death, Debt or Happiness

Platform: Print to Play

 Genre: Card Game

 Rating: E Target Market: Ages 6+, casual gamers 

Game Overview: You get a call from your friend. He wants to go on a dangerous trip again. Which one will you choose, Death, Debt or Happiness? Be careful with your decisions as you embark on an exciting and realistic journey.  

 Instructions: Download the print to play instructions for more information Game Design Team

Rodger Phillips – Game Designer
